description: <p>An opportunity has arisen for a band 6 sister/charge nurse position within the Emergency Department at Charing Cross Hospital. <br /> <br /> Join our adult emergency nursing team at Charing Cross Hospital and work in a fast-paced environment. Working in a brand new £7.5 million state-of-the-art Emergency Department you’ll progress fast as part of an outstanding, supportive team. Alongside the co-located Urgent Care Centre, the Department sees an average of 300 patients a day, which offers a diverse range of patient presentations. The medical and nursing team work collaboratively to lead the department daily, and with a longer vision to achieve change and excellence in practice. <br /> <br /> Here are just some of the reasons why you should join our team and be part of hospitals that have made history:<br /> • work in a fast-paced, exciting environment<br /> • contribute to world-leading research<br /> • join an amazing and supportive team<br /> • enjoy a place where lifelong learning thrives<br /> • be a part of innovative new ways of working<br /> • experience a high profile Trust with a rich heritage<br /> <br /> “We are committed to equal opportunities and improving the working lives of our staff and will consider applications to work flexibly, part-time or job share. Please talk to us at interview about the flexibility you may need”</p>
title: Band 6 Senior Staff Nurse / Sister A&E - MIC
